 1. head to the [modwinth appwication page on github](https://github.com/settings/connyections/appwications/3acffb2e808d16d4b226). make suwe to be wogged into the github account you used fow modwinth!
 2. pwess the big wed "wevoke access" button nyext to the "pewmissions" headew.

once you have compweted those steps, pwess the "wog out" button bewow.
